revised_title: Stability of Earth's Axis of Rotation and the Influence of Solidification
tldr: The author investigates the stability of the Earth's axis of rotation and concludes that the displacement of the Earth's interior strata, due to solidification, tends to increase the stability of the axis. The author also discusses the influence of friction and local elevation and depressions on the axis, suggesting that these factors are not likely to cause significant changes in the Earth's rotation.
